attributes.action: Prioritise retail staff for COVID vaccination.we cannot work from home
attributes.additional_details: Retail staff do not have the same unions and support as teachers and medical staff. Retail staff need the support now
attributes.background: Anyone who had to go out to work during lockdown and after should be offered the vaccine as a priority.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567426
